text: Banyumize ebyafa ku Nuhu bwe yagamba abantube nti abange bantu bange, okubeera kwange mu mmwe n'okubajjukiza e bigambo bya Katonda bwe bibeeranga bibazitooweredde, nze nneekwasizza Katonda, kale mmwe mwekobaane ne bannammwe ate kyemusazeewo kireme kuba kya kyama olwo nno musalewo kye mwagala okukola era temunnindiriza
